message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $12000. This offer is exclusive to you and includes a limited-time discount. Please let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to only pay up to $10000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets within your acceptable range.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In order to make this deal more attractive to you, I am willing to negotiate the price down to $11000. This still allows us both to gain value from the transaction. Please let me know if this revised offer suits your needs.
